document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Man </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">compass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Despair </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">round </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Goalless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Road </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">faster </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">mile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Traveller </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">proceed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Unconscious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Width </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Unconscious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Sun </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">setting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">progress </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">accurate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">estimating </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Pain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">begun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">ignorance </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Angel </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">pilot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">along </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: No man can compass a despair
